ACBonesaw.name: O'Brien V. 113 Gravekeeper
ACBonesaw.description: A slight variation of the V.110, the Gravekeeper comes fitted with an embedded Bonesaw launcher, transforming the humble armoured car into an effective indirect anti-armour vehicle.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

ACTracked.name: O'Brien V. 121 Highlander
ACTracked.description: Fitted with all-terrain treads, the Highlander brings significant all-terrain mobility and performs especially well in snowy and mountainous enviroments.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

ACFlame.name: O'Brien V. 130 Wild Jack
ACFlame.description: While the Noble Firebrand Mk. XVII is a deadly flamethrower tank, a more efficient means of employing flame weapons was needed. Enter the Wild Jack. Named for the fiery idols mady by children for Dead Harvest, the Wild Jack is a variation of the Highlander.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

ACHeavy.name: O'Brien V. 101 Freeman
ACHeavy.description: This early O'Brien variant, the V.101 Freeman is fitted with a 360 degree ballistics cannon turret at the expense of top speed.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

LightUtilitySpitfire.name: Drummond Spitfire 100d
LightUtilitySpitfire.description: This LMG-mounted Light Utility Vehicle provides a heavy-duty weapons platform with superior speed. Perfectly suited for supporting flanking infantry or an armoured assault.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

LightUtilityDuckJeep.name: Drummond Loscann 55c
LightUtilityDuckJeep.description: This amphibious Light Utility Vehicle has been heavily modified to cross rivers and lakes with ease. Venturing out into the open sea is ill-advised, however.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

FieldATRCoin.name: Duncan's Coin 20mm
FieldATRCoin.description: This field gun is a capable, if somewhat flimsy, anti-tank weapon derived from cheap materials, crude processing, and utilizes dated technology. The affixed 20mm cannon may feel ancient by modern standards, but rest assured, it has no problems piercing modern armour.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles
Gunner (Right): Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 25% less damage per shot

ACAntiTankRifle.name: T5 "Percutio"
ACAntiTankRifle.description: This "Xiphos" variant is fitted with a high-powered anti-tank turret in place of the twin machine gun platform.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

ACRPG.name: T8 "Gemini"
ACRPG.description: Fitted with twin RPG launchers, the T8 employs hit-and-run assaults against enemy structures and emplacements.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

TanketteIxion.name: T20 "Ixion" Tankette
TanketteIxion.description: A bombastic variant of the T12 Tankette, the "Ixion" provides its crew with more support and a mounted Infantry Support Gun. Added weight from the armour results in reduced overall speed.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

TanketteVesta.name: T14 "Vesta" Tankette
TanketteVesta.description: The first T-class tankette to utilize this sturdier frame and versatile treads, the Vesta also represents the Velian's first foray into fire weapons. The "Vesta" boasts a light flame turret and ample storage for the additional fuel supply required.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

LightUtilityVehicleOdyssey.name: UV-5c "Odyssey"
LightUtilityVehicleOdyssey.description: This simple, modified Utility Vehicle is fitted with a reinforced hatch to provide one crew member with increased visibility for intense recon operations.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

LightUtilityVehicleIcarus.name: UV-24 "Icarus"
LightUtilityVehicleIcarus.description: This RPG-mounted Light Utility Vehicle provides a heavy-duty weapons platform with superior speed. Perfectly suited for assaulting enemy structures and vehicles, or supporting an armoured assault.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables

FieldATRCestus.name: GA6 "Cestus"
FieldATRCestus.description: This simple, dual-barreled short-range field gun packs a punch. Its economic construction makes for fairly basic assembly at the cost of longevity. Meant for Anti-Tank support, the Cestus is best utilized in ambushed tactics or woven between the lines of heavier armour.

general: Can be carried by vehicles that support up to medium sized shippables
Can be towed by certain vehicles
Gunner (Right): Equipped with a low velocity barrel that deals 50% less damage per shot
